Posts.Content: Oct 5, 2008 08:51PM angel_eyes wrote: hello...i'm 31 yrs old and will be 32 middle of october... i will also be starting on chemo oct 7... i will have adriamycin and cytoxan once every two weeks x4 then taxol and herceptin once every week x12weeks then every 3-4 weeks for a year...i had right mastectomy with axillary dissection 8/27/08, 5 of 27 nodes positive...no reconstruction.. i also had a port placed the same day, no complaints with the port....i'm staarting to feel scared today of what might happen when i start chemo...to those who already had chemo, do you feel nausea an hour after the infusion started? if so, did you take any nausea meds for prophylaxis? should i take nausea meds the night prior to chemo and continue 3days after chemo so i won't feel nauseated? other people also experienced diarrhea the first day of chemo... how many hours after the infusion will one experience it? i'm just concerned i might have an accident while getting the infusion... too embarrassing..  i'm not scared as much with the hair loss... i know there are wigs out there...i'm scared more of infection while on chemo... my oncologist was so blunt in saying it can kill me while on chemo...
